verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنَّهُ لَيْسَ لِي عِلْمٌ بِمَوْضِعِ رِزْقِي
verses.translation: O Allah! verily, I lack acquaintance with the place of my sustenance;
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INNAHU LAYSA LI `ILMUN BIMAWADI`I RIZQI

verses.text: وَإِنَّمَا أَطْلُبُهُ بِخَطَرَاتٍ تَخْطُرُ عَلَىٰ قَلْبِي
verses.translation: rather, I am seeking it owing to ideas that come upon my mind.
verses.transliteration: WA INNMA ATLUBUHU BIKHATARATIN TAKHTURU `ALA QALBI

verses.translation: I consequently wander in countries searching for it.
By doing such, I am as confused as the confounded,

verses.text: لاَ أَدْرِي أَفِي سَهْلٍ هَوُ أَمْ فِي جَبَلٍ
verses.translation: since I do not know whether my sustenance lies in a plain, on a mountain,
verses.transliteration: LA ADRI AFI SAHLIN HUWA AM FI JABALIN

verses.text: أَمْ في أَرْضٍ أَمْ في سَمَاءٍ
verses.translation: on the ground, in the air,
verses.transliteration: AM FI ARDIN AM FI SAMA'IN

verses.text: أَمْ فِي بَرٍّ أَمْ فِي بَحْرٍ
verses.translation: on lands, in seas,
verses.transliteration: AM FI BARRIN AM FI BAHRIN

verses.translation: at whose hands,
or who the source of it is.
I have full knowledge that You know all these,
the causes of them are in Your Hands,
and it is You Who distribute it out of Your compassion
and cause it out of Your mercy.
O Allah, please send blessings to Muhammad and his Household

verses.text: وَٱجْعَلْ يَا رَبِّ رِزْقَكَ لِي وَاسِعاً
verses.translation: and make, O Lord, Your sustenance that is provided (by You) to me expansive,
verses.transliteration: WAJ`AL YA RABBI RIZQAKA LI WASI`AN

verses.translation: my seeking for it easy for me,
and its source close to me.

verses.text: وَلاَ تُعَنِّنِي بِطَلَبِ مَا لَمْ تُقَدِّرْ لِي فيهِ رِزْقاً
verses.translation: Please, do not fatigue me by seeking that which You have not decided for me to take,
verses.transliteration: WA LA TU`ANNINI BITALBI MA LAM TUQADDIRU LI FIHI RIZQAN

verses.translation: because You are certainly in no need for tormenting me
while I am in full need for Your mercy.
(Please) Send blessings upon Muhammad and his Household
and confer liberally upon me, Your slave, out of Your graciousness.
You are surely the Lord of great favor.
